description.pt1: I18next is an internationalization-framework written in and for JavaScript. But it's much more than that.
description.pt2: i18next goes beyond just providing the standard i18n features such as (plurals, context, interpolation, format). It provides you with a complete solution to localize your product from web to mobile and desktop.
description.pt3: The i18next-community created integrations for frontend-frameworks such as React, AngularJS, Vue.js and many more.
description.pt4: But this is not where it ends...you can also use i18next with Node.js, PHP, iOS, Android and other platforms.
